scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is an agreement binding William Patterson and John Ferrell to Edmund Randolph, then Governor of Virginia, for unspecified duties at a salary of fifty pounds. The agreement includes a provision that Randolph would issue a licence for marriage between William Patterson and Margaret Hippard. The place the document was signed is not specified and it lacks the signature of a government official attesting to its validity.
